00020    Cell::Cell()
00021     : begin_(0),
00022       offsetsPtr_(0),
00023       nextCellPtr_(0),
00024       nAtom_(0),
00025       atomCapacity_(0),
00026       isGhostCell_(true)

00041    /*
00042    * Fill an array with pointers to atoms in a cell and neighboring cells.
00043    *
00044    * Upon return, the NeighborArray neighbors contains pointers to all of
00045    * the atoms this cell and neighboring cells.  The first nAtom() elements
00046    * are the atoms in this cell.
00047    *
00048    * \param neighbors array of pointers to neighbor Atoms
00049    */
00050    void Cell::getNeighbors(NeighborArray &neighbors) const
00051    {
00052 
00053       // Preconditions
00054       assert(offsetsPtr_);
00055       assert(!isGhostCell_);
00056 
00057       const Cell* cellPtr;
00058       int   ia, nc, na;
00059 
00060       neighbors.clear();
00061 
00062       nc = offsetsPtr_->size();
00063       for (int ic = 0; ic < nc; ++ic) {
00064          cellPtr = this + (*offsetsPtr_)[ic];
00065          if (cellPtr->id() >= id_ || cellPtr->isGhostCell()) {
00066             na = cellPtr->nAtom();
00067             for (ia = 0; ia < na; ++ia) {
00068                neighbors.append(cellPtr->atomPtr(ia));
00069             }
00070          }
00071       }
00072    }
00073 
00074 
00075 }
00076 #endif
